statement.p: Explain how to find the dimension of W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} 0 \\ 1 \\ -4 \\ 0 \\ -2 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -4 \\ -4 \\ 3 \\ -2 \\ 1 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 20 \\ 18 \\ -7 \\ 10 \\ -1 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 52 \\ 47 \\ -19 \\ 26 \\ -3 \end{array}\right]\right\}.
